Language_Setting.Label: Language Setting
Language_Setting.Description:
Select the language for the settings/messages and the Category Switcher.
The language will change immediately when you select one.

Main_Setting.Label: General Settings
Main_Setting.Description:
To enable any of the following settings, just press the toggle on.
Once enabled, you will be able to adjust the values for the appropriate section.

Allowed_Paths.Label: Game Root Folders
Allowed_Paths.Description: Select the folders that contain all your games.
Allowed_Paths.WarningNote: Do not select the individual game folders, e.g. 'E:\Games\' not 'E:\Games\SpiderMan2'.

Excluded_Names.Label: Excluded Exe Files
Excluded_Names.Description: Only change this if you know what you’re doing! Define Exe Files that should be excluded for detecting.

Excluded_Folders.Label: Excluded Folders
Excluded_Folders.Description: Only change this if you know what you’re doing! Define folders that should be excluded when searching for the category.

AddExeName_Popup.Label: EXE-Name to exclude
AddExeName_Popup.PlaceholderText: Name of the EXE file to exclude

Save_Popup.Label: Save
Save_Popup.Description: The following changes are unsaved. Would you like to save them before closing?

Warning_Popup.Label: Warning
Warning_Popup.Description:
Selecting drives for scanning may cause high load and unnecessary false detections.
Are you sure this drive only contains programs you want to recognize?

Delete_Popup.Label: Delete Entries
Delete_Popup.Description: Are you sure you want to delete the following entries?

Chat.Description:
In the chat settings you can enable or disable the chatmessage function.
You can also customize the content of the automatic messages.
Chat.failedMessage: No category found for the Game: '{game}'
Chat.notInLocalDB: Local Only Mode enabled: Game '{game}' is not in local database

Optional_Settings.Description: Here you can adjust optional settings that change the behavior of the Category Switcher.

Important_Settings.Description:
These settings are crucial for the proper functioning of the Category Switcher.
Please review them carefully.

Similarity.Label: Match Similarity
Similarity.Description: Sets the percentage threshold at which a category is assigned to a found game.

DelayGeneral.Label: General Delay
DelayGeneral.Description: Defines how long to wait after closing general programs or games before automatically switching to the 'Just Chatting' category. Useful if programs frequently crash or are only briefly closed.

DelayProgramming.Label: Programming Delay
DelayProgramming.Description:
Defines how long to wait after closing programming-related applications before switching to the 'Just Chatting' category.
This delay only applies when the current category is 'Software & Development'.

Twitch_Info.Description: This Section shows you the ClientID and OAuthToken that Category Switcher received from Streamer.bot
Twitch_Info.Description_ClientID: Your Twitch Client ID, required for authenticated Twitch API access.
Twitch_Info.Description_OAuthToken: Your Twitch OAuthToken, required for authenticated Twitch API access.

Box_Art_Size.Label: Box Art Size
Box_Art_Size.Description: Select the Size of the Box Art Image

Streamer_bot.Label: Streamer.bot URL and Port
Streamer_bot.Description: Streamer.bot HTTP Server URL and Port, only change if you also change it in the Streamer.bot Settings!!

Fast_Api.Label: Fast API URL and Port
Fast_Api.Description: Fast API URL and Port, only change if you also change it in the C# Code of the Get Token Sub Action!!

Watch_Bot.Label: Watch Streamer.bot
Watch_Bot.Description: Option to stop Category Switcher when Streamer.bot is closed

Watch_OBS.Label: Watch OBS
Watch_OBS.Description: Option to stop Category Switcher when Streamer.bot is closed

Local_DB.Label: Only Local Database
Local_DB.Description: When enabled Category Switcher only changes to Categories already inside game_Data.json and won't search Twitch for a match

Show_Console.Label: Show Console Window
Show_Console.Description: If enabled the console window for Category Switcher will open. Mostly used to see why a Category is not recogniced

Chat_Message.Label: Chat Message
Chat_Message.Description: Enable or disable sending a chat message when a category is changed or an error occurs.

As_Announcement.Label: Send as Announcement
As_Announcement.Description: Enables sending the chat message as a Twitch announcement when the category changes or an error occurs.

Update_Message.Label: Changed Message in Chat
Update_Message.Description: Message that displays when the category was changed. Enable to modify the message.

Failed_Message.Label: Failed Message in Chat
Failed_Message.Description: Message that displays when the category change failed. Enable to modify the message.

Not_in_DB_Message.Label: Not in local DB Message
Not_in_DB_Message.Description: Message that displays when Local only Mode is active and a game is not found in the local database. Enable to modify teh message.

Censor_Mode.Label: Censor Mode
Censor_Mode.Description: Enabling will produce a game_data_censored.json where all filepaths are removed.
